desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生＆攻撃力の上限値（９９９９９）を１５００００まで解放する＆状態異常の敵へのダメージを超絶アップ＆攻撃ＢＢの威力を超絶アップ＆ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減

dictionary.lore: Another sword made by the swordsmith Zergel, who played an active part in the war against the gods. The Holy Blade is said to have been crafted using Zergel's most refined techniques, therefore it was said to possess a power pure enough to vanquish evil. However, this led many swordsmen to fight over it due to that very reputation, and in the end, Zergel sealed the Hallowed Blade away to prevent a war over it.

name: 弑神禍弓アラストラ
